job.title: Software Engineer-App Store Frameworks
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brWhen this team introduced the App Store it launched a cultural and economicbrbrphenomenon that changed the way people live work and play Thesebrbrengineers continue to innovate the platform now home to over 15 million appsbrbr each created using the teams own software development kit and relatedbrbrservices All those apps mean the store takes billions of requests from morebrbrthan 500 million visitors every week across iOS macOS tvOS iPadOS andbrbrwatchOSbrbrTo deliver such a rich experience at this scale the engineers build highperformancebrbrsystems backed up by persistent systemwide AB testing And tobrbrhelp people discover apps they love the team uses machine learningbrbrtechniques that include natural language processing to develop newbrbralgorithms for personalization search and recommender systems In a worldbrbrwhere apps have become essential in peoples daily lives the App Store teambrbrhas become essential to Apples businessbrbrAreas of work include macOSiOS Engineering FullStack Engineering FrontEndbrbrEngineering BackEnd Engineering Quality Engineering Machine LearningbrbrEngineering Data Science Data Engineering Site Reliability Engineering CommercebrbrEngineering and Engineering Project ManagementbrbrbrThe App Store engineering team is looking for a motivated and dedicated engineer to join our team Help build the next generation App Store and continually enhance our current store The App Store team empowers developers to create successful global businesses and customers to discover the best apps Be a part of a innovative team making a differencebrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brStrong programming fundamentals and experience with ObjectiveCbrbrStrong problem solving and critical thinking skillsbrbrYou have a passion for quality and attention to detailbrbrYou bring a depth of experience working with large code basesbrbrYou are passionate about reaching millions of users across our many platformsbrbrYou love collaborating under tight deadlines and tackling problems with imaginative and elegant solutionsbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brThe App Store Frameworks team works crossfunctionally throughout Apple to develop reliable daemons great APIs for app installation InApp Purchases and On Demand Resources Help design and implement APIs used by Apple employees and developers around the world We actively investigate production issues to resolve bugs and enhance performance with each iOStvOSmacOS release Scalability is always a top concern due to the massive userbase of iOStvOSmacOS customers Reliability is crucial and were looking for engineers with a passion for architecting complex systemsbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBachelors degree or higher in Computer Science or other relevant disciplinebrbr brRole Number 200210069brbr
